Articles.Content:
Since the up date i have been loving that i can change flag per mission.

now can we have the next step pls, and can you make it so we can Slap it on the side on the side of the Kan and all over the launch vehicle.
Support. I'd love to have my rocket decorated with mission flag.
Seems like a nice, comparatively-simple addition to the game to me. +1

Pretty sure it was already planned. I mean, there used to be a decal button in the VAB, it just didn't do anything.

Either way, I'd love to be able to drag and drop my flag or even just random decals(or custom decals!) onto my rockets kinda like how you can create custom decals in APB and stick them onto your clothes or car wherever you want.
I had the same thought. I asked In the mod section, and my wish was greanted.
